entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2
